papers.title: Optimization of Solar Panel Efficiency in Bangladesh Climate
papers.summary: Study on solar panel efficiency optimization techniques considering Bangladesh's tropical monsoon climate conditions
papers.abstract: This research investigates optimal solar panel configurations and maintenance strategies for maximizing energy output in Bangladesh's unique climate. The study analyzes temperature effects, humidity impact, and seasonal variations on photovoltaic efficiency.

papers.title: Low-Cost Automation Solutions for Small-Scale Manufacturing
papers.summary: Designing affordable Arduino-based automation systems for local manufacturing units in Bangladesh
papers.abstract: This paper proposes cost-effective automation solutions using Arduino microcontrollers tailored for small and medium enterprises in Bangladesh. Focus on reducing labor costs while maintaining quality and increasing productivity.
